snippet.title: irori - Cook up a variety of skewers to warm bellies and hearts!
snippet.description:
Play for free on itch.io https://pomepomelo.itch.io/irori?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt A As the aroma of savoury skewers wafts outside, hungry passengers rest their weary souls at the hearth. You are the chef on the cross-lands train, in charge of the irori cabin. Cook up a variety of skewers to warm bellies and hearts as you cross paths with travellers on their own journeys.

➡️ More from pomepomelo https://pomepomelo.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More cute games https://itch.io/games/tag-cute?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
